question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/switchboard_sui/on_demand/sources/actions/queue/queue_add_fee_coin_action.move] [Function: validate()] [Validation Cost] The has_authority() check may involve cryptographic verification - can repeated failed validation attempts be used for gas griefing? (Critical)
